projects.title: Algo Visualizer
projects.description: A high-performance algorithm visualizer featuring lightweight client-side routing and a modular component system. Uses real-time state management to transparently demonstrate complex algorithmic concepts.

projects.title: SM-2 CLI
projects.description: A Spaced Repetition CLI built on the SM-2 algorithm. Use it to master anything: coding problems, flashcards, study material, or any skill that benefits from scheduled review.
